2024.title: PostgreSQL 16 Release
2024.description: PostgreSQL 16 introduces significant improvements in parallel query execution, logical replication performance, and JSON/JSONB operations. New features include table access method API and enhanced pg_stat_statements.

2024.title: MongoDB 7.0 with Queryable Encryption
2024.description: MongoDB 7.0 brings expanded queryable encryption capabilities, allowing more operations on encrypted data, plus enhanced time series collections and improved analytics integrations.

2024.title: DuckDB's Rising Popularity
2024.description: DuckDB gains widespread adoption as an embedded analytical database, offering OLAP capabilities with minimal setup. Version 0.9 adds window functions, improved Arrow integration, and better JSON handling.

2024.title: Vector Search in Major Databases
2024.description: PostgreSQL (with pgvector), MongoDB, and Redis implement efficient vector similarity search capabilities, making it easier to integrate AI embeddings directly in traditional databases.

2024.title: CockroachDB Serverless GA
2024.description: CockroachDB Serverless becomes generally available, offering elastic scaling and pay-per-use pricing for distributed SQL workloads, with improved multi-region capabilities.

2024.title: MySQL HeatWave on AWS
2024.description: Oracle expands MySQL HeatWave to AWS, bringing its in-memory query acceleration and machine learning capabilities to the platform, competing with Aurora and other cloud databases.

2024.title: SQLite Extensions Ecosystem
2024.description: SQLite's extension ecosystem grows with litestream for replication, sqlite-utils for CLI operations, and litefs for distributed filesystems, making it more viable for production.

2024.title: Elasticsearch 8.12 LLM Features
2024.description: Elasticsearch 8.12 introduces built-in language model integration, semantic search capabilities, and enhanced vector search functionality for AI-powered search applications.

2024.title: Redis Stack Modules
2024.description: Redis Stack consolidates popular modules (JSON, Search, Graph, TimeSeries) into a comprehensive package, simplifying deployment of Redis as a multi-model database.
